description: This source file defines a ViewModel class for a weather forecast feature in an Android app. It manages state for the forecast view, fetches weather data from a WeatherRepository, and updates UI state accordingly.

classes.name: ForecastState
classes.description: Data class representing the state of the forecast UI, including headline, count of forecast days, loading status, and potential error message.

classes.name: ForecastViewModel
classes.description: ViewModel responsible for fetching weather forecast data, managing UI state based on repository responses, and exposing state flows for UI observation.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches weather forecast data for the specified location and number of days, updating the internal state with loading status, results, or errors.
